Question: Gowow Ori(Beijing) Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
GOWOW Ori(Beijing) Technology Co., Ltd

Product: Orion ORI Electric Dirtbike

- Maximum power: 9KW
- Max. torque: 420 NM at the drive wheel end
- Battery capacity: 72V38.4AH 2.8KWH
- Lightweight design of 73KG
- Streamlined design body
- Nimble and light with a riding triangle point
- Compact design with less wind resistance
- Waterproof, dustproof, and corrosion-resistant
- GOWOW custom tire pattern for strong grip on any terrain
- All core electronic components designed with IPX7 grade waterproof
- GOWOW custom-developed shock absorber system with 210mm travel lightweight inverted front shock and rear shock compression and rebound multi-stage adjustable with a four-link structure

For more information, visit www.gowow.com
Summary_cn:
GOWOW Ori（北京）科技有限公司

产品：奥瑞恩 ORI 电动越野摩托车

- 最大功率：9千瓦
- 最大扭矩：420纳米，驱动轮端
- 电池容量：72V38.4AH 2.8千瓦时
- 73公斤的轻量化设计
- 流线型设计的车身
- 灵活轻巧，驾乘三角点
- 紧凑设计，风阻小
- 防水、防尘、耐腐蚀
- GOWOW 自主研发的轮胎花纹，在任何地形上具有良好的抓地力
- 所有核心电子元件设计采用IPX7防水等级
- GOWOW 自主研发的避震系统，带有210mm行程轻量倒立式前避震器和后避震器，具有多级可调的压缩和回弹，采用了四连杆结构

了解更多信息，请访问www.gowow.com
